comment: CR-023 pre-review COMPLIANT. Frontmatter verified: title='Create SOP-007: Agent Orchestration', revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-002 Section 8). All 12 required sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. No prohibited {{...}} placeholders found. Execution-phase [...] placeholders correctly present. No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX content. Section numbering sequential and correct. Tables and formatting consistent. Referenced session notes (SOP-007-draft.md) exist and content aligns with CR description. Impact assessment complete. Testing summary provides appropriate verification items for SOP creation. Implementation plan adequate. Ready for pre-approval.

NON-COMPLIANT. Deficiency: CR-023 frontmatter revision_summary field contains 'Initial draft'. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, v1.0+ documents must have revision_summary beginning with the authorizing CR ID. For CRs, established practice (CR-017, CR-022) is self-reference. CR-023 revision_summary should be 'CR-023: Create SOP-007: Agent Orchestration' or similar. All other post-review requirements per SOP-002 Section 7.3 are met: execution complete (all EIs Pass), no VARs required, SOP-007 is EFFECTIVE with correct CR-023 traceability, evidence documented. Correct the revision_summary and re-route for post-review.

Post-review verification complete. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title='Create SOP-007: Agent Orchestration', revision_summary='CR-023: Create SOP-007: Agent Orchestration'. (2) EI-1 and EI-2 both show Task Outcome=Pass with execution summaries. (3) SOP-007 confirmed EFFECTIVE at v1.0 via qms status. (4) SOP-007 frontmatter verified: title='Agent Orchestration', revision_summary='CR-023: Initial creation' - traceability established per SOP-002 Section 8. (5) SOP-007 contains all 8 sections with complete content, no placeholder text. (6) Execution Summary documents successful completion with no deviations. All SOP-002 Section 7.3 post-review requirements verified and met.
